column4: anyone know why the livecd has reiser4progs but can't mount a reiser4 partition?
reiser4progs is a toolset.  resiser4 is an unofficial kernel patch that is not in ANY distro at the moment
So it is...I had assumed it was included by now.
reiser4 is not in the official kernel tree due to "politics" (and some code problems on the side0
